jme3tools.android
Class Fixed

java.lang.Object
  jme3tools.android.Fixed

public final class Fixed
extends java.lang.Object

Fixed point maths class. This can be tailored for specific needs by changing the bits allocated to the 'fraction' part (see FIXED_POINT , which would also require SIN_PRECALC and COS_PRECALC updating).

http://blog.numfum.com/2007/09/java-fixed-point-maths.html

HALF

See Also:
Constant Field Values

QUARTER_CIRCLE

public static final int QUARTER_CIRCLE
Quarter circle resolution for trig functions (should be a power of two). This is the number of discrete steps in 90 degrees.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FULL_CIRCLE_MASK

public static final int FULL_CIRCLE_MASK
Mask used to limit angles to one revolution. If a quarter circle is 64 (i.e. 90 degrees is broken into 64 steps) then the mask is 255.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

hyp

public static int hyp(int x1,
                      int y1,
                      int x2,
                      int y2)
Rough calculation of the hypotenuse. Whilst not accurate it is very fast.

Derived from a piece in Graphics Gems.

sqrt

public static int sqrt(int n)
Fixed point square root.

Derived from a 1993 Usenet algorithm posted by Christophe Meessen.
